trigger.match: ^#brutal hp (?<truehp>\d+):(?<maxhp>\d+):(?<hp>\d+) sp (?<truesp>\d+):(?<maxsp>\d+):(?<sp>\d+) ep (?<trueep>\d+):(?<maxep>\d+):(?<ep>\d+) xp (?<exp>\d+):(?<exptolvl>\d+):(?<pertolvl>\d+)\% ad (?<adtolvl>(\-\d+)|(\d+)):(?<protoadv>\d+)\% df (?<df>\d+) \$\$ (?<cash>\d+) ph (?<phase>\S+) dt (?<dt>\S+) hr (?<hr>.+) st(?<status>.+) :$
trigger.name: prompt

muclient.script:
-- package config path local plugin_path plugin_path = GetInfo(60) .. "brutal-plugin\\brutal\\?.lua" package.path = package.path .. ";" .. plugin_path
--load main config file require "brutal"
